steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eina4","text":"Quantify the fluorescence of a serial dilution of membrane fluorophore and of proteintag fluorophore in 1% SDS-containing buffer ( ,  ,  ,  ,   of each fluor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":136,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":139,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":142,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d6ust","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5B7E4950CABF11EC9EE46FC84888343D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"61FF7A60CABF11EC9EE46FC84888343D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"69108F60CABF11EC9EE46FC84888343D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"6EA3B6F0CABF11EC9EE46FC84888343D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"750D8F70CABF11EC9EE46FC84888343D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"563ht","text":"Compare the slopes of a plot of fluorescence intensity vs. concentration for the membrane dye and the protein dye to account for differences in optical properties.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88ofr","text":"Quantify the fluorescence of a series of GUV preparations containing varying mole percentage of membrane fluorophore (0.01%, 0.05%, 0.1%, 0.5%, 1%), using a rectangular selection of an approximately horizontal segment of each GUV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctmhm","text":"Calculate the surface density of membrane dye from known surface area of lipids (~0.7nm2 /lipid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":87,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
